parameters: \pop[1]There are a lot of picnickers all over the island on
\pop[1]Being a picnicker is a fun way to learn about
Pokémon, I like to come to the beach to watch the Krabby.
\pop[1]You seem to be a very talented trainer. I want to
become a Pokémon trainer too one day.
\pop[1]I wonder how long it takes to become a strong and powerful
Pokémon trainer like you. I guess it depens on your talent.
\pop[1]You must have met a lot of picnickers all over the world,
we aren't very strong, but we enjoy figthing with our Pokémon.
\pop[1]Are you enjoying the calm and tranquility that
\pop[1]Trainers like you are the example of the successful
of the Zero Project. I'm thinking about joining one day.
\pop[1]Are you \N[1], the famous Pokémon trainer? Oh my god!
I'm your fan! I joined the Zero project because of you!
\pop[1]¡Hay muchos domingueros por toda la isla los domingos!
\pop[1]Ser dominguero es una forma divertida de aprender sobre
los Pokémon. A mi me gusta venir a la playa para ver a los Krabby.
\pop[1]Pareces un entrenador muy talentoso. A mi también
me gustaría convertirme en entrenadora Pokémon algún día.
\pop[1]Me pregunto cuánto tiempo lleva convertirse en un entrenador

todo el mundo, no somos muy fuertes pero disfrutamos peleando.

\pop[1]Los entrenadores como tú son un ejemplo del éxito del

¡Soy tu fan! ¡Me uní al Proyecto Zero por ti!
\pop[1]The kids have a lot of fun in the beach.
\pop[1]Los niños se lo pasan muy bien en la playa.
\pop[1]My husband and me have been coming to this beach
every Wednesday since the island was habitated 30 years ago!
\pop[1]¡Mi marido y yo llevamos viniendo a esta playa todos
los miércoles desde que se habitó la isla hace 30 años!
\pop[1]Water-type Pokémon are so cool! Don't you think so?
\pop[1]¡Los Pokémon tipo agua son geniales! ¿No opinas igual?
\pop[1]Going to the beach with my boyfriend is a great
\pop[1]Ir a la playa con mi novio es un gran placer de

\pop[1]How are you doing? You are a sympathetic and great
trainer, aren't you? Would you do something for me?
\pop[1]I always see a lot of Krabby in the beach, I'd like
to catch one but I'm really bad at catching Pokémon...
\pop[1]Could you catch one Krabby for me? I'm a humble dressmaker,
but I could give you some fancy clothes. Do you accept?
\pop[1]Thank you so much! You can find me here every Saturday.
\pop[1]¿Qué tal estás? Eres un buen y simpático entrenador,
¿verdad? ¿Crees que podrías hacer una cosa por mi?
\pop[1]Siempre veo un montón de Krabby por la playa, y me
gustaría atrapar uno, pero soy horrible capturando Pokémon...
\pop[1]¿Podrías atrapar un Krabby por mi? Sólo soy un humilde
modista, pero podría ofrecerte ropa bonita a cambio, ¿aceptas?
\pop[1]Thank you so much! Take this as thanks.
\pop[1]I'm very excited about getting my first Pokémon!
\pop[1]¡Tengo muchas ganas de obtener mi primer Pokémon!

\pop[2]It's important to know when to take a break.
One can't handle with everything always, and it's ok to rest.
\pop[2]Es importante saber cuándo tomarse un descanso.
Uno no puede con todo siempre, y está bien parar.
\pop[2]Discipline is the most valuous talent. With it, a
\pop[2]La disciplina es el talento más valioso. Con disciplina
una persona puede llegar a dominar cualquier arte.
\pop[2]Life is full of obstacles and bad times, but
it is worth overcoming them for the great moments.
\pop[2]La vida está llena de obstaculos y malos momentos, pero
merece la pena superarlos por los grandes momentos.
\pop[5]I love my children, but I sometimes miss how it
was going to the beach before we were parents.
\pop[5]Amo a mis hijos, pero a veces echo de menos
cómo era ir  a la playa cuando no teniamos niños.
\pop[5]One is never too old to enjoy a beach day!
\pop[5]¡Uno nunca es demasiado mayor para disfrutar de
\pop[5]My girlfriend loves going to the beach but I don't.
She really thinks I like it as much as her, what should I do?
\pop[5]You're right. She will understand and we will be
doing other activities that are liked by both!
I wonder if we could... change our Fridays plans...
\pop[1]So you've been lying to me the last five years??
What's wrong with you? In what else have you been lying?
\pop[5]W-w\.-\.wait a minute. It's not like I've been five years
pretending that I liked the beach!
\pop[5]I just got tired of it! But you like it so much that\..\..\..
I don't know Sophie, don't get mad at me please!
\pop[1]I don't want to listen your excuses, this ends here,
\pop[1]I thought you were different, but I was wrong...

\pop[5]I reckon that is the best to make my girlfriend happy!

\pop[5]¡Solo me cansé de ella! Pero te gusta tanto que\..\..\..

\pop[8]Me and my Rattata are looking for a worthy rival.

to give you this if I saw you.
\pop[10]Soy al ayudante del Profesor Gary. Me pidió que te diera
\pop[10]Ser el ayudante del Profesor Gary es agotador...
\pop[11]If you have any question about Heyday Island or S.S.Anne,
you should ask Sarah, she can answer any question.
\pop[11]Si tienes alguna pregunta sobre el S.S.Anne o
Isla Apogeo, pregunta a Sarah, ella puede responder a todo.
\pop[11]The cabin services are useful, but it is better not
\pop[11]Los servicios de la cabaña son muy útiles, pero
es mejor no entrar por la noche...
\pop[12]I use to relax in the beach after long sailings.
\pop[12]Suelo relajarme en la playa después de navegaciones
\pop[12]I love sailing and I'm in love with the sea, but sometimes a
sailor needs to take a rest and put their feet on the ground.
\pop[12]Amo navegar y estoy enamorado del mar, pero a veces un
marinero necesita descansar y poner los pies en tierra.
\pop[12]The hardest part of being a sailor is missing your
family. I spend so much time in the sea.
\pop[12]La parte más dura de ser marinero es echar de
menos a la familia. Paso mucho tiempo en el mar.
And we'll all hang on behind♫
\pop[12]Mi Wiscash es fiable, mi Wiscash es robusto♫
a todos los Entrenadores derrota de un susto♫
\pop[12]When at night the stars shine and the sky
is clear, it is best to go sailing the next morning.
\pop[12]Cuando por la noche las estrellas brillen y el cielo
esté despejado, lo mejor es salir a navegar a la siguiente mañana.
Information about Tourmaland, the S.S. Anne and everything you should know!
\pop[10]Do you see that PokéBall icon in the head of
\pop[10]¿Ves ese icono de Pokéball que tiene ese entrenador
\pop[10]It means that he wants to battle, so If you talk to
him you can fight against him. It could be your very first battle.
\pop[10]But be careful, some trainers don't have that icon
and start fighting just by exchanging glances!
\pop[10]Significa que quiere luchar, así que si hablas con él,

Dusknoir tiene una actitud extraña, le ha dicho algo a Grovyle\..\..\..
There's something strang with this Dusknoir... It seems it has gone through a lot.
Hay algo extraño en este Dusknoir... Parece que ha pasado por mucho.
\pop[18]Hello.\..\.. I feel some ghostly aura from you. Are you
into the macabre? I have an idea, take this.
\pop[18]You just need no find the door that is opened with
\pop[18]People are usually scared of me and my Dusknoir.
They try to avoid me as if I couldn't notice it.
\pop[18]Stupid people, they are more intersting when they are dead,
I've had cooler conversations with dead people than with living ones.
\pop[18]I find Spiritomb way more cute than Pikachu.
Why is Pikachu even that popular? I don't understand it.
\pop[18]The sea is full of corpses. What an amazing and terrorific
place. And people like it because it is "relaxing"!
\pop[18]There's a Hex Maniac Club in the island. Of course, you
need to have a disturbed aura to join us.
\pop[18]When you look at the sky in the night you see a lot of stars shining.
There's a small possibility that some of them had already died.
\pop[18]With humans it is the same. Maybe you have talked to
\pop[18]People being more afraid of ghosts than they are other people
doesn't make sense to me. A dead person can be evil just as an alive one.
\pop[18]The difference is that only the living person can
\pop[18]Dark Pokémon aren't well received by humans. For example, Absol
is one of the most kind and noble Pokémon in the world.
\pop[18]They warn us about disasters that are about to occur. But
we are stupid, and think Absol causes the disasters.
\pop[18]Absol isn't well received by most of the people. but they
still warn us. To be honest, we don't deserve their help.
\pop[18]That's why people use to fear the future, but not the past. We
could say that living humans are like the past, and dead people the future.
\pop[18]In this metaphor, I could say that the Hex Maniac Club can
see the future. That's why we don't fear ghosts. And you shouldn't too.
\pop[18]Death and life are two faces of the same coin. One doesn't make
sense without the other one. Chasing immortality is stupid.
\pop[18]Are people bad because they want to do harm, or
are they just people with an altered perception of good?

\pop[26]Beautiful, right? It's very rare to see these kind of
Pokémon here, you must be special.
\pop[26]That was a Lugia, a legendary Pokémon from Johto. What
was he doing here, in Heyday Island?
\pop[26]That was a Ho-oh, a legendary Pokémon from Johto. What
was he doing here, in Heyday Island?
I'm Gary Alder, you are \N[1], aren't you?
\pop[26]Before you say anything, yes, my surname is a kind of
tree. I don't know why but some give a lot of importance to this.
\pop[26]And yes, I'm the Professor Pokémon who created the Zero
Project. It's me, I don't wear a white coat but you can rely on me.
\pop[26]You must be impatient to receive your Pokémon. Come with me,
I have everything prepared in the cabin.
\pop[26]Precioso, ¿verdad? Es muy raro ver a este tipo de
Pokémon por aquí, debes ser especial.
\pop[26]Era un Lugia, ave legendaria de la región de Johto.
¿Que estaría haciendo aquí, en Isla Apogeo?
\pop[26]Era un Ho-oh, ave legendaria de la región de Johto.
¿Que estaría haciendo aquí, en Isla Apogeo?
\pop[26]El comportamiento de los Pokémon puede ser algo impredecible
a veces. Por cierto, soy Gary Alder, tu eres \N[1], ¿verdad?
\pop[26]Antes de que digas nada, sí, mi apellido es un tipo de árbol
No sé por qué pero algunos le dan mucha importancia a eso.
\pop[26]Y sí, soy el Profesor Pokémon que creó el Proyecto Zero.
Soy yo, no llevo una bata blanca pero puedes fiarte de mi.
\pop[26]Debes estar impaciente por recibir a tu primer Pokémon.
Ven conmigo, lo tengo todo preparado en la cabaña.
